long_description: Spray Ben's Clothing and Gear repellent directly on clothes, tents, backpacks and other equipment to keep biting insects away. Permethrin is odorless when dry and it will not damage your clothing or gear. Bottle contains enough repellent to treat 2 complete outfits or 1 set of gear. Single treatment lasts up to 2 weeks. Ben's Clothing and Gear repellent has a locking cap to prevent accidental spraying.
short_description: Spray Ben's Clothing and Gear repellent directly on clothes, tents, backpacks and other equipment to keep biting insects away.
